name: Legacy
storyline: You are the child of a royal chieftain. On a day just like any other day, while enjoying the sport of fishing out at sea with your friends, the great mountain overlooking your grand village rumbled to life. It swallowed all that you could see of your land in a large black shroud. The sea rose up and threw your entire fishing party into an army of raging waves as the day quickly turned to night. After what felt like days, clinging to a piece of debris as a dark storm raged overhead the sea gave you up to an unfamiliar coastline. You, and two of your people will now start what will become your LEGACY.
summary: A single player fantasy RPG starting in a prehistoric era. Survival and city building along with group raiding mechanics puts you in control of the leader of your people trying to survive and then thrive. Start with just a few villagers and expand into a sprawling advanced civilization. Survival, exploration, crafting, city building and role playing mechanics all influence the gameplay. Game is in development with a developers early release available to play.
